circumstances:
The crew was engaged in a circular night training mission at RAF Saint Eval. On final approach, the pilot in command decided to abandon the landing procedure and started a go around. During initial climb, the twin engine aircraft went out of control and crashed near the airport. All three crew members were killed. 
Crew (233th Squadron):
Sgt Stanley Edwin Hyam, 
Sgt William Wilfred Parr
Sgt Sydney William Benson.
